pli-tv-kd14:4.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena jātiyā sattavassena arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.3: Yaṁ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṁ sabbaṁ tena anuppattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.4: Natthi cassa kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.5: Atha kho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.7: Yaṁ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṁ sabbaṁ mayā anuppattaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.8: Natthi ca me kiñci uttarikaraṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.9: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ saṅghassa veyyāvaccaṁ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.10: Atha kho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.11: “yannūnāhaṁ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññapeyyaṁ bhattāni ca uddiseyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.3: “idha mayhaṁ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.5: Yaṁ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṁ, sabbaṁ mayā anuppattaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.6: Natthi ca me kiñci uttarikaraṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.7: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ saṅghassa veyyāvaccaṁ kareyyan’ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.9: ‘yannūnāhaṁ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññapeyyaṁ bhattāni ca uddiseyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.10: Icchāmahaṁ, bhante, saṅghassa senāsanañca paññāpetuṁ bhattāni ca uddisitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.12: Tena hi tvaṁ, dabba, saṅghassa senāsanañca paññapehi bhattāni ca uddisāhī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.13: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto bhagavato paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.2: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammannatu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.5: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.7: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.10: Saṅgho āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammannati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.11: Yassāyasmato khamati āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa senāsanapaññāpakassa ca bhattuddesakassa ca sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.13: Sammato saṅghena āyasmā dabbo mallaputto senāsanapaññāpako ca bhattuddesako ca.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.14: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.1: Sammato ca panāyasmā dabbo mallaputto sabhāgānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.2: Ye te bhikkhū suttantikā tesaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.4: Ye te bhikkhū vinayadharā tesaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.6: Ye te bhikkhū dhammakathikā tesaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.8: Ye te bhikkhū jhāyino tesaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.10: Ye te bhikkhū tiracchānakathikā kāyadaḷhibahulā viharanti tesampi ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.12: Yepi te bhikkhū vikāle āgacchanti tesampi tejodhātuṁ samāpajjitvā teneva ālokena senāsanaṁ paññapeti;
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.15: Te āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.17: Te āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.20: “amhākaṁ, āvuso dabba, gijjhakūṭe pabbate senāsanaṁ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.22: Amhākaṁ, āvuso, isigilipasse kāḷasilāyaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.23: Amhākaṁ, āvuso, vebhārapasse sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.24: Amhākaṁ, āvuso, sītavane sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre senāsanaṁ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.30: Amhākaṁ, āvuso, maddakucchimhi migadāye senāsanaṁ paññapehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.31: Tesaṁ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto tejodhātuṁ samāpajjitvā aṅguliyā jalamānāya purato purato gacchati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.32: Tepi teneva ālokena āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.33: Tesaṁ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.34: “ayaṁ mañco, idaṁ pīṭhaṁ, ayaṁ bhisi, idaṁ bibbohanaṁ, idaṁ vaccaṭṭhānaṁ, idaṁ passāvaṭṭhānaṁ, idaṁ pānīyaṁ, idaṁ paribhojanīyaṁ, ayaṁ kattaradaṇḍo, idaṁ saṅghassa katikasaṇṭhānaṁ, imaṁ kālaṁ pavisitabbaṁ, imaṁ kālaṁ nikkhamitabban”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.35: Tesaṁ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapetvā punadeva veḷuvanaṁ paccāgacchati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū navakā ceva honti appapuññā ca.
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.2: Yāni saṅghassa lāmakāni senāsanāni tāni tesaṁ pāpuṇanti lāmakāni ca bhattāni.
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.3: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe manussā icchanti therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhisaṅkhārikaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ dātuṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.7: Te pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā there bhikkhū pucchanti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.8: “tumhākaṁ, āvuso, bhattagge kiṁ ahosi, tumhākaṁ kiṁ ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.10: “amhākaṁ, āvuso, sappi ahosi, telaṁ ahosi, uttaribhaṅgaṁ ahosī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati saṅghassa catukkabhattaṁ deti niccabhattaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.3: aññe odanena pucchanti, aññe sūpena pucchanti, aññe telena pucchanti, aññe uttaribhaṅgena pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.4: Tena kho pana samayena kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino bhattaṁ svātanāya mettiyabhūmajakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uddiṭṭhaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.5: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati ārāmaṁ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.6: So yenāyasmā dabbo mallaputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.7: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho kalyāṇabhattikaṁ gahapatiṁ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.8: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.9: “kassa, bhante, amhākaṁ ghare svātanāya bhattaṁ uddiṭṭhan”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.10: “Mettiyabhūmajakānaṁ kho, gahapati, bhikkhūnaṁ tumhākaṁ ghare svātanāya bhattaṁ uddiṭṭhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.11: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati anattamano ahosi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.12: Kathañhi nāma pāpabhikkhū amhākaṁ ghare bhuñjissantīti gharaṁ gantvā dāsiṁ āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.13: “ye, je, sve bhattikā āgacchanti te koṭṭhake āsanaṁ paññapetvā kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.14: “Evaṁ, ayyā”ti kho sā dāsī kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.2: “hiyyo kho, āvuso, amhākaṁ kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino bhattaṁ uddiṭṭhaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.3: sve amhe kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati saputtadāro upatiṭṭhitvā parivisissati;
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.4: aññe odanena pucchissanti, aññe sūpena pucchissanti, aññe telena pucchissanti, aññe uttaribhaṅgena pucchissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.5: Te teneva somanassena na cittarūpaṁ rattiyā supiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.6: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.7: Addasā kho sā dāsī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante;
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.8: disvāna koṭṭhake āsanaṁ paññapetvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.11: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho na tāva bhattaṁ siddhaṁ bhavissati yathā mayaṁ koṭṭhake nisīdāpiyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.12: Atha kho sā dāsī kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena upagañchi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.17: ‘ye, je, sve bhattikā āgacchanti, te koṭṭhake āsanaṁ paññapetvā kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.20: “hiyyo kho, āvuso, kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati ārāmaṁ agamāsi dabbassa mallaputtassa santike.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.21: Nissaṁsayaṁ kho mayaṁ dabbena mallaputtena gahapatino antare paribhinnā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.22: Te teneva domanassena na cittarūpaṁ bhuñjiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.23: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā ārāmaṁ gantvā pattacīvaraṁ paṭisāmetvā bahārāmakoṭṭhake saṅghāṭipallatthikāya nisīdiṁsu tuṇhībhūtā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyantā appaṭibhānā.
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.1: Atha kho mettiyā bhikkhunī yena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.5: tatiyampi kho mettiyā bhikkhunī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.10: “Tathā hi pana tvaṁ, bhagini, amhe dabbena mallaputtena viheṭhiyamāne ajjhupekkhasī”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.12: “Sace kho tvaṁ, bhagini, iccheyyāsi, ajjeva bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ nāsāpeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.15: “Ehi tvaṁ, bhagini, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ evaṁ vadehi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.16: ‘idaṁ, bhante, nacchannaṁ nappatirūpaṁ, yāyaṁ, bhante, disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṁ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.20: “Evaṁ, ayyā”ti kho mettiyā bhikkhunī mettiyabhūmajakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.21: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho mettiyā bhikkhunī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.22: “idaṁ, bhante, nacchannaṁ nappatirūpaṁ, yāyaṁ, bhante, disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṁ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.2: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathāyaṁ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.4: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.5: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathāyaṁ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.7: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.8: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathāyaṁ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.13: “Yatohaṁ, bhante, jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.17: Idaṁ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.18: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyaṁ bhikkhuniṁ nāsesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.19: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū te bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.20: “māvuso, mettiyaṁ bhikkhuniṁ nāsetha, na sā kiñci aparajjhati;
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.21: amhehi sā ussāhitā kupitehi anattamanehi cāvanādhippāyehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.22: “Kiṁ pana tumhe, āvuso, āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.24: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.25: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.26: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.27: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayaṁ detu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.3: tena, bhikkhave, dabbena mallaputtena saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā, ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā, vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā, ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā, añjaliṁ paggahetvā, evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.4: ‘ime maṁ, bhante, mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.5: Sohaṁ, bhante, sativepullappatto saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.8: ‘ime maṁ, bhante, mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.9: Sohaṁ sativepullappatto tatiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.12: Ime mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.13: Āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sativepullappatto saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācati.

pli-tv-kd14:9.1.5: yo na chandāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṁ gaccheyya, gahitāgahitañca jāneyya.
pli-tv-kd14:9.1.7: Paṭhamaṁ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:9.1.9: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ salākaggāhāpakaṁ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd14:9.1.13: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno salākaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;

pli-tv-kd14:10.1.1: Dasayime, bhikkhave, adhammikā salākaggāhā, dasa dhammikā.
pli-tv-kd14:10.1.3: Oramattakañca adhikaraṇaṁ hoti, na ca gatigataṁ hoti, na ca saritasāritaṁ hoti, jānāti adhammavādī bahutarāti, appeva nāma adhammavādī bahutarā assūti, jānāti saṅgho bhijjissatīti, appeva nāma saṅgho bhijjeyyāti, adhammena gaṇhanti, vaggā gaṇhanti, na ca yathādiṭṭhiyā gaṇhanti—
pli-tv-kd14:10.2.2: Na ca oramattakaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ hoti, gatigatañca hoti, saritasāritañca hoti, jānāti dhammavādī bahutarāti, appeva nāma dhammavādī bahutarā assūti, jānāti saṅgho na bhijjissatīti, appeva nāma saṅgho na bhijjeyyāti, dhammena gaṇhanti, samaggā gaṇhanti, yathādiṭṭhiyā ca gaṇhanti—
pli-tv-kd14:11.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena upavāḷo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti, paṭijānitvā avajānāti, aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati, sampajānamusā bhāsati.
pli-tv-kd14:11.1.2: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd14:11.1.3: “kathañhi nāma upavāḷo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānissati, paṭijānitvā avajānissati, aññenaññaṁ paṭicarissati, sampajānamusā bhāsissatī”ti.

pli-tv-kd14:11.1.9: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho upavāḷassa bhikkhuno tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ karotu.

pli-tv-kd14:11.2.4: Ayaṁ upavāḷo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti, paṭijānitvā avajānāti, aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati, sampajānamusā bhāsati.
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.5: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho upavāḷassa bhikkhuno tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.8: Ayaṁ upavāḷo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti, paṭijānitvā avajānāti, aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati, sampajānamusā bhāsati.
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.10: Yassāyasmato khamati upavāḷassa bhikkhuno tassapāpiyasikākammassa karaṇaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.15: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:12.1.2: Asuci ca hoti, alajjī ca, sānuvādo ca, tassa saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ karoti dhammena, samaggena—
pli-tv-kd14:12.1.3: imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikākammassa karaṇāni.

pli-tv-kd14:12.3.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ dhammakammañca hoti, vinayakammañca, suvūpasantañca.

pli-tv-kd14:12.4.2: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.5: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.

pli-tv-kd14:12.4.7: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—

pli-tv-kd14:12.4.15: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.17: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.

pli-tv-kd14:12.4.19: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—

pli-tv-kd14:14.18.1: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū taṁ āvāsaṁ āgacchantā antarāmagge na sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi, taṁ āvāsaṁ gantvā āvāsikā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.2: ‘idaṁ kho, āvuso, adhikaraṇaṁ evaṁ jātaṁ, evaṁ samuppannaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.3: sādhāyasmantā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamentu dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, yathayidaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ suvūpasantaṁ assā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.4: Sace, bhikkhave, āvāsikā bhikkhū vuḍḍhatarā honti, āgantukā bhikkhū navakatarā, tehi, bhikkhave, āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āgantukā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.5: ‘iṅgha tumhe, āyasmanto, muhuttaṁ ekamantaṁ hotha, yāva mayaṁ mantemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.6: Sace pana, bhikkhave, āvāsikā bhikkhū navakatarā honti, āgantukā bhikkhū vuḍḍhatarā, tehi, bhikkhave, āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āgantukā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.7: ‘tena hi tumhe, āyasmanto, muhuttaṁ idheva tāva hotha, yāva mayaṁ mantemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.8: Sace pana, bhikkhave, āvāsikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ mantayamānānaṁ evaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.9: ‘na mayaṁ sakkoma imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanenā’ti, na taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi sampaṭicchitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.10: Sace pana, bhikkhave, āvāsikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ mantayamānānaṁ evaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.11: ‘sakkoma mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanenā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.12: Tehi, bhikkhave, āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āgantukā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.13: ‘sace tumhe, āyasmanto, amhākaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ yathājātaṁ yathāsamuppannaṁ ārocessatha, yathā ca mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamessāma dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā suvūpasantaṁ bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.15: No ce tumhe, āyasmanto, amhākaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ yathājātaṁ yathāsamuppannaṁ ārocessatha, yathā ca mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamessāma dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā na suvūpasantaṁ bhavissati, na mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ sampaṭicchissāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.16: Evaṁ supariggahitaṁ kho, bhikkhave, katvā āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ sampaṭicchitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.17: Tehi, bhikkhave, āgantukehi bhikkhūhi āvāsikā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.18: ‘yathājātaṁ yathāsamuppannaṁ mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āyasmantānaṁ ārocessāma.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.19: Sace āyasmantā sakkonti ettakena vā ettakena vā antarena imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā suvūpasantaṁ bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.20: Evaṁ mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āyasmantānaṁ niyyādessāma.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.21: No ce āyasmantā sakkonti ettakena vā ettakena vā antarena imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā na suvūpasantaṁ bhavissati, na mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āyasmantānaṁ niyyādessāma.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.23: Evaṁ supariggahitaṁ kho, bhikkhave, katvā āgantukehi bhikkhūhi taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āvāsikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ niyyādetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.24: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ, idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.29: evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.1: Tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi tasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.3: sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.4: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti, tathārūpassa dhammā bahussutā honti, dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.5: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.6: vinaye kho pana ṭhito hoti asaṁhīro;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.7: paṭibalo hoti ubho atthapaccatthike assāsetuṁ saññāpetuṁ nijjhāpetuṁ pekkhetuṁ pasādetuṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.13: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi dasahaṅgehi samannāgataṁ bhikkhuṁ ubbāhikāya sammannituṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.2: Paṭhamaṁ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.4: Amhākaṁ imasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.5: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuṁ sammanneyya ubbāhikāya imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.8: Amhākaṁ imasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.9: Saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuṁ sammannati ubbāhikāya imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.10: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhuno sammuti ubbāhikāya imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.12: Sammato saṅghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhu ubbāhikāya imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.13: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.21.1: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṁ, idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.21.6: evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.1: Tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi tasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne tatrāssa bhikkhu dhammakathiko, tassa neva suttaṁ āgataṁ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṁ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṁ paṭibāhati, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.4: Imassa neva suttaṁ āgataṁ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.5: So atthaṁ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṁ paṭibāhati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.6: Yadāyasmantānaṁ pattakallaṁ, itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasameyyāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.7: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū taṁ bhikkhuṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ, idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.12: evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.1: Tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi tasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne tatrāssa bhikkhu dhammakathiko, tassa suttañhi kho āgataṁ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṁ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṁ paṭibāhati, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.4: Imassa suttañhi kho āgataṁ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.5: So atthaṁ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṁ paṭibāhati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.6: Yadāyasmantānaṁ pattakallaṁ, itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasameyyāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.7: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū taṁ bhikkhuṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ, idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.12: evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.1: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṁ, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ saṅghassa niyyādetabbaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.2: ‘na mayaṁ, bhante, sakkoma imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṁ, saṅghova imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametū’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.3: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ yebhuyyasikāya vūpasametuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.5: yo na chandāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṁ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṁ gaccheyya, gahitāgahitañca jāneyya …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.7: Paṭhamaṁ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.9: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ salākaggāhāpakaṁ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.13: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno salākaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.16: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.18: Yathā bahutarā bhikkhū dhammavādino vadanti tathā taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.25: Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṁ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.28: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.31: Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikā sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.34: Yā yebhuyyasikākammassa kiriyā karaṇaṁ upagamanaṁ ajjhupagamanaṁ adhivāsanā appaṭikkosanā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.36: Evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.1: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyā evaṁ jātaṁ evaṁ samuppannaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.4: assosuṁ kho amukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulā therā viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā paṇḍitā viyattā medhāvino lajjino kukkuccakā sikkhākāmā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.5: Te ce therā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasameyyuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, evamidaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ suvūpasantaṁ assāti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū taṁ āvāsaṁ gantvā te there etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.7: “idaṁ, bhante, adhikaraṇaṁ evaṁ jātaṁ, evaṁ samuppannaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.8: Sādhu, bhante, therā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamentu dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, yathayidaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ suvūpasantaṁ assā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.10: yathā sāvatthiyā saṅghena adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamitaṁ tathā suvūpasantanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.13: asantuṭṭhā sāvatthiyā saṅghassa adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā sambahulānaṁ therānaṁ adhikaraṇavūpasamanena—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.14: assosuṁ kho amukasmiṁ kira āvāse tayo therā viharanti …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.16: eko thero viharati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.17: So ce thero imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasameyya dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, evamidaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ suvūpasantaṁ assāti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.18: Atha kho te bhikkhū taṁ āvāsaṁ gantvā taṁ theraṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.19: “idaṁ, bhante, adhikaraṇaṁ evaṁ jātaṁ, evaṁ samuppannaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.20: Sādhu, bhante, thero imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametu dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, yathayidaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ suvūpasantaṁ assā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.22: yathā sāvatthiyā saṅghena adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamitaṁ, yathā sambahulehi therehi adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamitaṁ, yathā tīhi therehi adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamitaṁ, yathā dvīhi therehi adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamitaṁ, tathā suvūpasantanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.24: Atha kho te bhikkhū asantuṭṭhā sāvatthiyā saṅghassa adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā sambahulānaṁ therānaṁ adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā tiṇṇaṁ therānaṁ adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā dvinnaṁ therānaṁ adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā ekassa therassa adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.1: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ saññattiyā tayo salākaggāhe—
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.4: Tena salākaggāhāpakena bhikkhunā salākāyo vaṇṇāvaṇṇāyo katvā ekameko bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.13: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, gūḷhako salākaggāho hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.15: Tena salākaggāhāpakena bhikkhunā ekamekassa bhikkhuno upakaṇṇake ārocetabbaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.24: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, sakaṇṇajappako salākaggāho hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.28: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, vivaṭako salākaggāho hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.3: sammukhāvinayena ca, sativinayena ca, amūḷhavinayena ca, tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.10: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.11: Tassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayo dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.13: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.16: Sohaṁ, bhante, sativepullappatto saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.21: Bhikkhū itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.23: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayaṁ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.26: Bhikkhū itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.28: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayaṁ deti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.29: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayassa dānaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.33: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.34: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.41: Yo ca anuvadati, yañca anuvadati, ubho sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.44: Yā sativinayassa kammassa kiriyā karaṇaṁ upagamanaṁ ajjhupagamanaṁ adhivāsanā appaṭikkosanā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.46: Evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.28.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ummattako hoti cittavipariyāsakato.
pli-tv-kd14:14.28.8: Tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ hoti bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.28.9: Taṁ bhikkhū ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena āpattiyā codenti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.28.13: Tena me ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.28.18: Tassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno amūḷhassa amūḷhavinayo dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.28.20: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā …pe…

pli-tv-kd14:14.29.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ saṅghamajjhe garukāya āpattiyā codeti—

pli-tv-kd14:14.29.10: ‘na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, sarāmi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.12: ‘iṅghāyasmā sādhukameva jānāhi, yadi sarasi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.14: ‘na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, sarāmi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.15: Sarāmi ca kho ahaṁ, āvuso, evarūpiṁ appamattikaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.17: ‘iṅghāyasmā sādhukameva jānāhi, yadi sarasi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.19: ‘imañhi nāmāhaṁ, āvuso, appamattikaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā apuṭṭho paṭijānissāmi.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.20: Kiṁ panāhaṁ evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā, puṭṭho na paṭijānissāmī’ti?
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.22: ‘imañhi nāma tvaṁ, āvuso, appamattikaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā apuṭṭho na paṭijānissasi.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.23: Kiṁ pana tvaṁ evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā, apuṭṭho paṭijānissasi?
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.24: Iṅghāyasmā sādhukameva jānāhi, yadi sarasi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.26: ‘sarāmi kho ahaṁ, āvuso, evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.27: Davā me etaṁ vuttaṁ, ravā me etaṁ vuttaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.28: nāhaṁ taṁ sarāmi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā’ti.

pli-tv-kd14:14.29.34: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.37: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe garukāya āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti, paṭijānitvā avajānāti, aññenāññaṁ paṭicarati, sampajānamusā bhāsati.

pli-tv-kd14:14.29.53: Evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.30.3: sammukhāvinayena ca, paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, tiṇavatthārakena ca.

pli-tv-kd14:14.30.10: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.30.23: Yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti, ubho sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.30.26: Yā paṭiññātakaraṇassa kammassa kiriyā karaṇaṁ upagamanaṁ ajjhupagamanaṁ adhivāsanā appaṭikkosanā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.30.28: Evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ paṭiggāhako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.31.2: No ce labhetha, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sambahule bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā—

pli-tv-kd14:14.33.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalahajātānaṁ vivādāpannānaṁ viharataṁ bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ hoti bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.

pli-tv-kd14:14.33.9: Sace mayaṁ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṁ kāressāma, siyāpi taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṁvatteyyā’ti.

pli-tv-kd14:14.33.16: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyya, ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṁ, ṭhapetvā gihippaṭisaṁyuttanti.
